metadata.dc:author: Salso, S
Barberán, J
Tejeda, M I
metadata.dc:description: The incidence of invasive pulmonary aspergillosis (IPA) is increasing among non-neutropenic patients in recent years. The difficulty of early diagnosis in these patients involves a delay in the onset of adequate treatment and higher mortality.
metadata.dc:title: Aspergilosis pulmonar en pacientes no neutropénicos.
[Invasive pulmonary aspergillosis in non-neutropenic patients].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de quimioterapia : publicacion oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Quimioterapia
